mil7.3.8:1.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘niyāmakassa tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
mil7.3.8:1.2: “Yathā, mahārāja, niyāmako rattindivaṃ satataṃ samitaṃ appamatto yattappayatto nāvaṃ sāreti;
mil7.3.8:1.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena cittaṃ niyāmayamānena rattindivaṃ satataṃ samitaṃ appamattena yattappayattena yoniso manasikārena cittaṃ niyāmetabbaṃ.
mil7.3.8:1.4: Idaṃ, mahārāja, niyāmakassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.3.8:3.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, niyāmakassa yaṃ kiñci mahāsamudde kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā, sabbaṃ taṃ viditaṃ hoti;
mil7.3.8:3.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena kusalākusalaṃ sāvajjānavajjaṃ hīnappaṇītaṃ kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgaṃ vijānitabbaṃ.
mil7.3.8:3.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, niyāmakassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.3.8:4.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, niyāmako yante muddikaṃ deti ‘mā koci yantaṃ āmasitthā’ti;
mil7.3.8:4.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena citte saṃvaramuddikā dātabbā ‘mā kiñci pāpakaṃ akusalavitakkaṃ vitakkesī’ti, idaṃ, mahārāja, niyāmakassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.3.8:4.4: ‘mā, bhikkhave, pāpake akusale vitakke vitakkeyyātha, seyyathidaṃ—
